content.raw: I briefly looked through the filter proxy model in both plugins and they look very similar. It could a nice use case for reuse of code. The search does have some hardcoded assumptions like using data from source model index 0, ignoring "title", expand on search (applies only to tree item not table), etc. Maybe we can make that configurable if it's going to be its own class.
content.html: I briefly looked through the filter proxy model in both plugins and they look very similar. It could a nice use case for reuse of code. The search does have some hardcoded assumptions like using data from source model index 0, ignoring "title", expand on search (applies only to tree item not table), etc. Maybe we can make that configurable if it's going to be its own class.
